attributes.action: Ask MPs to support the bill to force a second referendum on the terms of Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
Please contact your MP to ask them to support the Bill on its second reading.
http://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/contact-your-mp/
attributes.background: A bill to force a second referendum on the terms of Brexit has been introduced in Parliament. It survived it's first reading today with no objections. The second reading is due on Friday May 12th. Its not about “blocking” Brexit but the British people should be free to decide the terms of Brexit.
